body.p:
Mayfield Oct 4th 1861
S H Jenkins & others
Members of Kentucky Senate

Gentlemen -- we need an additional Notary Public in our County to protest bills notes &C all having left on account of the disturbed Condition of the Country. and I would recommend that Wes Blount of this place be appointed to that position he being in all respects qualified and likely to stay here as long as the Country last & hope you will take such Steps as is necessary to secure his appointment

S H Jenkins & others
members of Ky Senate
Frankfort
Ky
